
``` java

CREATE TABLE "Person" (
  "person_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "name" varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  "created_at" timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE "Team" (
  "team_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "team_name" varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  "team_code" varchar(10),
  "country" varchar(50),
  "team_type" varchar(20),
  "created_at" timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE "Player" (
  "player_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "person_id" int NOT NULL,
  "team_id" int,
  "is_active" boolean DEFAULT true,
  "created_at" timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE "Event" (
  "event_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "event_name" varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  "season" varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  "created_at" timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE "Match" (
  "match_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "event_id" int NOT NULL,
  "match_number" varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  "match_type_id" int NOT NULL,
  "match_date" date NOT NULL,
  "venue" varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  "city" varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  "gender_category_id" int NOT NULL,
  "balls_per_over" int DEFAULT 6,
  "total_overs" int,
  "team_type" varchar(20),
  "toss_winner_team_id" int,
  "toss_decision" varchar(10),
  "match_winner_team_id" int,
  "win_by_runs" int,
  "win_by_wickets" int,
  "result_description" varchar(200),
  "player_of_match_id" int,
  "revision" integer,
  "data_version" varchar(10),
  "created_at" timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE "MatchTeam" (
  "match_team_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "match_id" int NOT NULL,
  "team_id" int NOT NULL,
  "team_role" varchar(10),
  "innings_order" int,
  "created_at" timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE "MatchPlayer" (
  "match_player_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "match_id" int NOT NULL,
  "team_id" int NOT NULL,
  "player_id" int NOT NULL,
  "created_at" timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE "MatchOfficial" (
  "match_official_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "match_id" int NOT NULL,
  "person_id" int NOT NULL,
  "official_role_id" int NOT NULL,
  "created_at" timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE "MatchType" (
  "match_type_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "type_name" varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  "type_code" varchar(10),
  "total_overs" int,
  "created_at" timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE "GenderCategory" (
  "gender_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "gender_name" varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  "gender_code" varchar(10),
  "created_at" timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE "OfficialRole" (
  "official_role_id" INT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY,
  "role_name" varchar(30) NOT NULL,
  "created_at" timestamp
);

CREATE INDEX ON "Match" ("match_date", "event_id");

CREATE INDEX ON "Match" ("match_number");

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ON "MatchTeam" ("match_id", "team_id");

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ON "MatchPlayer" ("match_id", "team_id", "player_id");

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ON "MatchOfficial" ("match_id", "person_id", "official_role_id");

ALTER TABLE "Player" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("person_id") REFERENCES "Person" ("person_id");

ALTER TABLE "Player" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("team_id") REFERENCES "Team" ("team_id");

ALTER TABLE "Match" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("event_id") REFERENCES "Event" ("event_id");

ALTER TABLE "Match" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("match_type_id") REFERENCES "MatchType" ("match_type_id");

ALTER TABLE "Match" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("gender_category_id") REFERENCES "GenderCategory" ("gender_id");

ALTER TABLE "Match" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("toss_winner_team_id") REFERENCES "Team" ("team_id");

ALTER TABLE "Match" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("match_winner_team_id") REFERENCES "Team" ("team_id");

ALTER TABLE "Match" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("player_of_match_id") REFERENCES "Player" ("player_id");

ALTER TABLE "MatchTeam" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("match_id") REFERENCES "Match" ("match_id");

ALTER TABLE "MatchTeam" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("team_id") REFERENCES "Team" ("team_id");

ALTER TABLE "MatchPlayer" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("match_id") REFERENCES "Match" ("match_id");

ALTER TABLE "MatchPlayer" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("team_id") REFERENCES "Team" ("team_id");

ALTER TABLE "MatchPlayer" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("player_id") REFERENCES "Player" ("player_id");

ALTER TABLE "MatchOfficial" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("match_id") REFERENCES "Match" ("match_id");

ALTER TABLE "MatchOfficial" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("person_id") REFERENCES "Person" ("person_id");

ALTER TABLE "MatchOfficial" ADD FOREIGN KEY ("official_role_id") REFERENCES "OfficialRole" ("official_role_id");


```
